name: Unlock'd
description:
• Game saves are stored in your web browser. 
  • For the best experience, make sure your sound is on.
  • Unlock’d was conceived and designed by Soft Dagger for Toronto Game Jam 2021.

Credits

This year, Soft Dagger consisted of:

Keyi Zhou: Programming

James Long: Programming

Athena Zhao: Writing, art, and sound design
Twitter

Phoebe Zhou: Art
Twitter

Lina Wu: Writing and art
Instagram / Portfolio

Thank you for playing!
